step.cmd: On the homepage, select either the first or third floor classroom, and mark the date(s) you want to reserve on the drop-down calendar.
step.info: If days on the calendar are colored in orange, it means the classroom you selected is not available on that day.

step.cmd: On the next page, enter the number of people in your group, and list any accomodations your group may need.
